mapper.sql: t0.*,t1.fid feid,t1.fbillid,t1.fentryid,t1.fmaterialid,t1.fnote,t1.fqty,t1.fredate,t1.freqty,t1.fstockid, t3.fid suid,t3.supplierNumber sunumber,t3.supplierName suname, t5.fid crid,t5.username crname,t6.fid auid,t6.username auname,t9.fid fmaid,t9.materialNumber,t9.materialName,t9.materialModel, t9.materialUnit,t10.fid fstid,t10.stockNumber,t10.stockName,t10.stockAddress,t10.stockTel
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from T_VS_BillReturn t0 left join T_VS_BillReturnEntry t1 on t0.fid=t1.fbillid left join T_VS_Supplier t3 on t0.fsupplierid=t3.fid left join T_VS_User t5 on t0.fcreatorid=t5.fid left join T_VS_User t6 on t0.fauditdate=t6.fid left join T_VS_Material t9 on t1.fmaterialid=t9.fid left join T_VS_Stock t10 on t1.fstockid=t10.fid
order by ${orderByClause}

select
from T_VS_BillReturn t0 left join T_VS_BillReturnEntry t1 on t0.fid=t1.fbillid left join T_VS_Supplier t3 on t0.fsupplierid=t3.fid left join T_VS_User t5 on t0.fcreatorid=t5.fid left join T_VS_User t6 on t0.fauditdate=t6.fid left join T_VS_Material t9 on t1.fmaterialid=t9.fid left join T_VS_Stock t10 on t1.fstockid=t10.fid where t0.fid = #{fid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into T_VS_BillReturn ( fnumber, fbizdate, fstate, fbiztype, fsupplierid, fnote, fcreatorid, fcreatedate, fauditorid, fauditdate) values ( #{fnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fbizdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fstate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fbiztype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fsupplierid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fnote,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fcreatorid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fcreatedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fauditorid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fauditdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into T_VS_BillReturn
fnumber,
fbizdate,
fstate,
fbiztype,
fsupplierid,
fnote,
fcreatorid,
fcreatedate,
fauditorid,
fauditdate,

where fid = #{fid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
